title: Could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED
body:
When I run step7:  7) convert H128 with all default settings.This error happens:
Choose mode: (1) hist match, (2) hist match bw, (3) seamless (default), (4) seamless hist match :
Choose erode mask modifier [-100..100] (default 0) :
Choose blur mask modifier [-100..200] (default 0) :
Choose output face scale modifier [-50..50] (default 0) :
Transfer color from original DST image? [0..1] (default 0) :
Degrade color power of final image [0..100] (default 0) :
Export png with alpha channel? [0..1] (default 0) :
Running converter.

Loading model...
===== Model summary =====
== Model name: H128
==
== Current epoch: 3712
==
== Options:
== |== batch_size : 1
== |== multi_gpu : False
== |== created_vram_gb : 8.0
== Running on:
== |== [0 : GeForce GTX 1070]
=========================
2018-12-12 20:41:01.078817: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc:464] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED
2018-12-12 20:41:01.091446: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc:464] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED
2018-12-12 20:41:02.724756: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:353] Could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED
